message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $135. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm on a budget.
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your budget constraints. I am willing to negotiate at $110 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking $105 would be a better fit for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the price.
